snippet: Security is important, but the president must also address human rights on stops in Thailand, Myanmar and Cambodia.
abstract: Editorial supports Pres Obama's upcoming trip to Asia, which will show his commitment to having the United States engage more intensely in region where China's growing assertiveness presents a challenge; urges Obama to not only focus on security but also address human rights issues while making stops in Thailand, Myanmar and Cambodia.
lead_paragraph: Security is important, but the president must also address human rights on stops in Thailand, Myanmar and Cambodia.
